original_title: Kubasa in a Glass: The Strange World of the Winnipeg Television Commercial (1975-1993)
overview: A found footage video essay tracing Winnipeg's civic pathologies, aesthetic fabulations and exquisite strangeness through the prism of its own low-budget, lo-fi TV advertising produced between 1975 and 1992.
title: Kubasa in a Glass: The Strange World of the Winnipeg Television Commercial (1975-1993)
